ResourceString.name: ToolboxDefaultTabName
ResourceString.comment: The tab name for default toolbox

ResourceString.name: ValueType
ResourceString.comment: The display name used for an ObjectType when IsValueType is false

ResourceString.name: EntityType
ResourceString.comment: The display name used for an ObjectType when IsValueType is true

ResourceString.name: FactType
ResourceString.comment: The display name used for a simple FactType

ResourceString.name: SubtypeFact
ResourceString.comment: The display name used for a SubtypeFact

ResourceString.name: ObjectifiedFactType
ResourceString.comment: The display name used for an objectified (nested) FactType

ResourceString.name: ReadingType
ResourceString.comment: The display name used for a ReadingType

ResourceString.name: RolePlayerPickerNullItemText
ResourceString.comment: The name displayed to represent null in the role player picker

ResourceString.name: NestedFactTypePickerNullItemText
ResourceString.comment: The name displayed to represent null in the nested fact type picker

ResourceString.name: NestingTypePickerNullItemText
ResourceString.comment: The name displayed to represent null in the nesting type picker

ResourceString.name: EntityTypeDefaultNamePattern
ResourceString.comment: The base name used to create a name for a new EntityType. This is a format string

ResourceString.name: PortableDataTypeUnspecified
ResourceString.comment: The descriptive text for a PortableDataType of Unspecified.

ResourceString.name: PortableDataTypeTextFixedLength
ResourceString.comment: A fixed length text data type

ResourceString.name: PortableDataTypeTextVariableLength
ResourceString.comment: A variable length text data type

ResourceString.name: PortableDataTypeTextLargeLength
ResourceString.comment: A large length text data type

ResourceString.name: PortableDataTypeNumericSignedInteger
ResourceString.comment: A signed integer numeric data type

ResourceString.name: PortableDataTypeNumericUnsignedInteger
ResourceString.comment: An unsigned integer numeric data type

ResourceString.name: PortableDataTypeNumericAutoCounter
ResourceString.comment: An auto counter numeric data type

ResourceString.name: PortableDataTypeNumericFloatingPoint
ResourceString.comment: A floating point numeric data type

ResourceString.name: PortableDataTypeNumericDecimal
ResourceString.comment: A decimal numeric data type

ResourceString.name: PortableDataTypeNumericMoney
ResourceString.comment: A money numeric data type

ResourceString.name: PortableDataTypeRawDataFixedLength
ResourceString.comment: A fixed length raw data data type

ResourceString.name: PortableDataTypeRawDataVariableLength
ResourceString.comment: A variable length raw data data type

ResourceString.name: PortableDataTypeRawDataLargeLength
ResourceString.comment: A large length raw data data type

ResourceString.name: PortableDataTypeRawDataPicture
ResourceString.comment: A picture raw data data type

ResourceString.name: PortableDataTypeRawDataOleObject
ResourceString.comment: An OLE object raw data data type

ResourceString.name: PortableDataTypeTemporalAutoTimestamp
ResourceString.comment: An auto timestamp temporal data type

ResourceString.name: PortableDataTypeTemporalTime
ResourceString.comment: An time temporal data type

ResourceString.name: PortableDataTypeTemporalDate
ResourceString.comment: An date temporal data type

ResourceString.name: PortableDataTypeTemporalDateAndTime
ResourceString.comment: An date and time temporal data type

ResourceString.name: PortableDataTypeLogicalTrueOrFalse
ResourceString.comment: A true or false logical data type

ResourceString.name: PortableDataTypeLogicalYesOrNo
ResourceString.comment: A yes or no logical data type

ResourceString.name: PortableDataTypeOtherRowId
ResourceString.comment: A row id data type (can not be classified in any of the groups above)

ResourceString.name: PortableDataTypeOtherObjectId
ResourceString.comment: An object id data type (can not be classified in any of the groups above)

ResourceString.name: ValueTypeDefaultNamePattern
ResourceString.comment: The base name used to create a name for a new ValueType. This is a format string with {0} being the placeholder for the number placement.

ResourceString.name: FactTypeDefaultNamePattern
ResourceString.comment: The base name used to create a name for a new FactType. This is a format string with {0} being the placeholder for the number placement.

ResourceString.name: SubtypeFactDefaultNamePattern
ResourceString.comment: The base name used to create a name for a new SubtypeFact. This is a format string with {0} being the placeholder for the number placement.

ResourceString.name: SubtypeFactPredicateInverseReading
ResourceString.comment: The inverse reading for the predicate created by creating a sub type relationship.

ResourceString.name: SubtypeFactPredicateReading
ResourceString.comment: The reading for the forward predicate created by creating a subtype relationship.

ResourceString.name: ImpliedFactTypePredicateInverseReading
ResourceString.comment: The inverse reading for the predicate created implicitly via objectification. There is no attempt made to keep the predicate readings unique in ring situations.We allow the model error to populate instead of generating an articial unique reading.

ResourceString.name: ImpliedFactTypePredicateReading
ResourceString.comment: The reading for the predicate created implicitly via objectification. There is no attempt made to keep the predicate readings unique in ring situations.We allow the model error to populate instead of generating an articial unique reading.

ResourceString.name: SubtypeFactComponentNameFormat
ResourceString.comment: String for generating a component name for a subtype. The {0} replacement field is used for the subtype component name; {1} for the supertype.

ResourceString.name: ExternalConstraintConnectActionInstructions
ResourceString.comment: The instructions shown when creating an external constraint

ResourceString.name: ExternalConstraintConnectActionTransactionName
ResourceString.comment: The transaction name used by the external constraint connect action. The text appears in the undo dropdown in the VS IDE.

ResourceString.name: FrequencyConstraintMinimumFormatString
ResourceString.comment: The string used to represent a greater than symbol on a frequency constraint.

ResourceString.name: FrequencyConstraintBetweenFormatString
ResourceString.comment: The string used to represent 'between' on a frequency constraint (eg: 'Between 1 and 5' would be represented as '1[this string]5'.

ResourceString.name: InternalUniquenessConstraintConnectActionInstructions
ResourceString.comment: The instructions shown when creating an internal uniqueness constraint

ResourceString.name: InternalUniquenessConstraintConnectActionTransactionName
ResourceString.comment: The transaction name used by the internal uniqueness constraint connect action. The text appears in the undo dropdown in the VS IDE.

ResourceString.name: InsertRoleTransactionName
ResourceString.comment: The transaction name used by the InsertRoleBefore/InsertRoleAfter commands. The text appears in the undo dropdown in the VS IDE.

ResourceString.name: RoleConnectActionTransactionName
ResourceString.comment: The transaction name used by the role connect action. The text appears in the undo dropdown in the VS IDE.

ResourceString.name: SubtypeConnectActionTransactionName
ResourceString.comment: The transaction name used by the subtype connect action. The text appears in the undo dropdown in the VS IDE.

ResourceString.name: OptionsPageChangeTransactionName
ResourceString.comment: The transaction name used when an options page change modifies diagram layout and connections. The text appears in the undo dropdown in the VS IDE.

ResourceString.name: DeleteRoleSequenceTransactionName
ResourceString.comment: The transaction name used for deleting a role sequence from a multi column external uniqueness constraint. The text appears in the undo dropdown in the VS IDE.

ResourceString.name: MoveRoleSequenceDownTransactionName
ResourceString.comment: The transaction name used for moving a role sequence down in a multi column external uniqueness constraint. The text appears in the undo dropdown in the VS IDE.

ResourceString.name: MoveRoleSequenceUpTransactionName
ResourceString.comment: The transaction name used for moving a role sequence up in a multi column external uniqueness constraint. The text appears in the undo dropdown in the VS IDE.

ResourceString.name: InterpretFactEditorLineTransactionName
ResourceString.comment: The transaction name used for changes made in response to committing a modified line in the fact editor. The text appears in the undo dropdown in the VS IDE.

ResourceString.name: ModelBrowserWindowTitle
ResourceString.comment: The window title for the model browser tool window

ResourceString.name: ModelExceptionObjectificationRequiresModel
ResourceString.comment: Exception message when an attempt is made to create an objectification relationship when the Model is not specified for either the NestingType or the NestedFactType.

ResourceString.name: ModelExceptionObjectificationImpliedElementModified
ResourceString.comment: Exception message when an attempt is made to modify roles, constraints, and role players on elements implied by an Objectification relationship.

ResourceString.name: ModelExceptionObjectificationImpliedFactObjectified
ResourceString.comment: Exception message when an attempt is made to objectify a fact that is implied by another objectification.

ResourceString.name: ModelExceptionReadingIsPrimaryToFalse
ResourceString.comment: The error message to return when an attempt is made to change the IsPrimary property of a reading to false.

ResourceString.name: ModelExceptionFactAddReadingInvalidReadingText
ResourceString.comment: The error message that is returned when attempting to add a new reading to a fact and the text is not valid. It needs to have a number of place holders equal to the number of roles in the fact and they need to have their positions identified by number using the replacement syntax of String.Format. For example: "{0} has {1}"

ResourceString.name: ModelErrorConstraintHasTooFewRoleSequencesText
ResourceString.comment: Model validation error shown when too few role sequences are defined for a constraint. This is a frequent occurrence as external constraints are easily created in this state.

ResourceString.name: ModelErrorConstraintHasTooManyRoleSequencesText
ResourceString.comment: Model validation error shown when too many role sequences are defined for a constraint. This is an infrequent occurrence which should not be attainable via the UI

ResourceString.name: ModelErrorConstraintExternalConstraintArityMismatch
ResourceString.comment: Model validation error text when role sequences in a multi column constraint have different role counts (arity).

ResourceString.name: ModelErrorModelHasDuplicateConstraintNames
ResourceString.comment: Model validation error shown when multiple constraints have the same name. This is an uncommon condition that should only occur with a hand edit to a model file.

ResourceString.name: ModelErrorModelHasDuplicateFactTypeNames
ResourceString.comment: Model validation error shown when multiple fact types have the same name. This is an uncommon condition that should only occur with a hand edit to a model file.

ResourceString.name: ModelErrorModelHasDuplicateObjectTypeNames
ResourceString.comment: Model validation error shown when multiple object types have the same name. This is an uncommon condition that should only occur with a hand edit to a model file.

ResourceString.name: ModelErrorRoleValueRangeMaxValueMismatchError
ResourceString.comment: Role data type does not match max inclusion

ResourceString.name: ModelErrorRoleValueRangeMinValueMismatchError
ResourceString.comment: Role data type does not match min inclusion

ResourceString.name: ModelErrorValueRangeMaxValueMismatchError
ResourceString.comment: Data type does not match max inclusion

ResourceString.name: ModelErrorValueRangeMinValueMismatchError
ResourceString.comment: Data type does not match min inclusion

ResourceString.name: ModelExceptionNameAlreadyUsedByModel
ResourceString.comment: Exception message when a name change in the editor attempts to introduce a duplicate name into the model.

ResourceString.name: ModelExceptionEnforceValueTypeNotNestingType
ResourceString.comment: Exception message when an attempt is made to make an object type both a value type and an objectified fact type.

ResourceString.name: ModelExceptionEnforceRolePlayerNotNestingType
ResourceString.comment: Exception message when an attempt is made to use the same type as both a role player and the nesting type of a fact type.

ResourceString.name: ModelExceptionEnforcePreferredIdentifierForUnobjectifiedEntityType
ResourceString.comment: Exception message when an attempt is made to set\ both a primary identifier and a value type or a nested fact type on the same object type.

ResourceString.name: ModelExceptionIsMandatoryRequiresAttachedFactType
ResourceString.comment: Exception message when an attempt is made to set the IsMandatory property on an unattached role. IsMandatory creates an internal constraint, which is owned by an FactType, so cannot be realized if the parent fact is unknown.

ResourceString.name: ModelExceptionPreferredIdentifierMustBeUniquenessConstraint
ResourceString.comment: Exception message when an attempt is made to create a preferred identifier relationship with an incompatible constraint type.

ResourceString.name: ModelExceptionInvalidInternalPreferredIdentifierPreConditions
ResourceString.comment: Exception message when an attempt is made to set an internal uniqueness constraint as a preferred identifier when the preconditions are not met.

ResourceString.name: ModelExceptionInternalConstraintInconsistentRoleOwners
ResourceString.comment: Exception message when an attempt is made to add roles from different fact types to a role sequence owned by an internal constraint.

ResourceString.name: CommandDeleteFactTypeText
ResourceString.comment: This text appears in the edit menu when fact types are selected in the diagram.

ResourceString.name: CommandDeleteObjectTypeText
ResourceString.comment: This text appears in the edit menu when object types are selected in the diagram.

ResourceString.name: CommandDeleteConstraintText
ResourceString.comment: This text appears in the edit menu when constraint types are selected in the diagram.

ResourceString.name: CommandDeleteMultipleText
ResourceString.comment: This text appears in the edit menu when multiple elements of different types are selected in the diagram.

ResourceString.name: CommandDeleteRoleText
ResourceString.comment: This text appears in the edit menu when roles are selected in the diagram.

ResourceString.name: ModelReadingEditorListColumnHeaderReadingText
ResourceString.comment: Text that appears in the headers of the reading editor tool window for the reading text Text that appears in the headers of the reading editor tool window for the reading text

ResourceString.name: ModelReadingEditorListColumnHeaderIsPrimary
ResourceString.comment: Text that appears in the header of the IsPrimary column in the reading editor tool window.

ResourceString.name: ModelReadingEditorAllReadingsNodeName
ResourceString.comment: The text to place in the node of the tree in the readings editor that shows all readings for the fact.

ResourceString.name: ModelReadingEditorMissingRolePlayerText
ResourceString.comment: The text to display in the readings editor when a role has no roleplayer.

ResourceString.name: ModelReadingEditorNewItemText
ResourceString.comment: The text that will be used for the new reading item in the readings list of the reading editor tool window.

ResourceString.name: ModelReadingEditorNewReadingTransactionText
ResourceString.comment: Text used to describe the transaction created when creating a new reading.

ResourceString.name: ModelReadingEditorChangeReadingText
ResourceString.comment: Text used to label the transaction created when changing reading text through the editor

ResourceString.name: ModelReadingEditorIsPrimaryToolTip
ResourceString.comment: ToolTip text that appears on the reading list for the IsPrimary status column.

ResourceString.name: ModelReadingEditorChangePrimaryReadingText
ResourceString.comment: Text used to label the transaction created when which reading is primary is changed in the editor.

ResourceString.name: ModelReadingEditorWindowTitle
ResourceString.comment: Text to place in the title of the reading editor tool window.

ResourceString.name: ModelReadingEditorUnsupportedSelectionText
ResourceString.comment: Text that will display in the middle of the tool window when the document view currently has an unsuppoted collection.

ResourceString.name: PackageOfficialName
ResourceString.comment: The official name of the package used in the About dialog

ResourceString.name: PackageProductDetails
ResourceString.comment: The description of the package used in the About dialog

ResourceString.name: ModelReferenceModeEditorReferenceModeName
ResourceString.comment: returns the Text that names the reference mode.

ResourceString.name: ModelReferenceModeEditorEntityTypeName
ResourceString.comment: returns the Text that names the Entity Type.

ResourceString.name: ModelReferenceModeEditorReferenceModeKindHeader
ResourceString.comment: returns the Text used to name the Reference Mode Kind column

ResourceString.name: ModelReferenceModeEditorChangeNameTransaction
ResourceString.comment: returns the Text used to name the transaction the changes the name of a custom reference mode

ResourceString.name: ModelReferenceModeEditorCustomReferenceModesHeader
ResourceString.comment: returns the Text used to name the Custom Reference Modes column

ResourceString.name: ModelReferenceModeEditorIntrinsicReferenceModesHeader
ResourceString.comment: returns the Text used to name the Intrinsic Reference Modes column

ResourceString.name: ModelReferenceModeEditorAbbreviatedEntityTypeName
ResourceString.comment: returns the abbreviated form of the entity type name

ResourceString.name: ModelReferenceModeEditorAbbreviatedReferenceModeName
ResourceString.comment: return the abbreviated form of the reference mode name

ResourceString.name: ModelReferenceModeEditorAddCustomReferenceModeTransaction
ResourceString.comment: returns the text used to name the transaction that adds a custom reference mode

ResourceString.name: ModelReferenceModeEditorAddNewRowText
ResourceString.comment: returns the text to display the add a new row to the custom reference modes branch

ResourceString.name: ModelReferenceModeEditorChangeFormatStringTransaction
ResourceString.comment: returns the text used to name the transaction that changes the format string.

ResourceString.name: ModelReferenceModeEditorEditorWindowTitle
ResourceString.comment: returns The text that displays the title of the editor window.

ResourceString.name: ModelExceptionReferenceModeEnforceUniqueFormatString
ResourceString.comment: returns Exception message when the unique format string rule is violated for reference modes

ResourceString.name: ModelExceptionReferenceModeKindEnforceUniqueFormatString
ResourceString.comment: returns Exception message when the unique format string rule is violated for reference mode kinds

ResourceString.name: ModelExceptionReferenceModeIntrinsicRefModesDontChange
ResourceString.comment: returns Exception messege when atttempt is made to change the kind of an intrinsic reference mode

ResourceString.name: ModelExceptionReferenceModeReferenceModesKindNotEmpty
ResourceString.comment: returns Exception messege when attempt is made to remove reference mode kind.

ResourceString.name: ModelReferenceModeEditorChangeReferenceModeKindTransaction
ResourceString.comment: returns Text used to name the transaction that changes the referencemode Kind.

ResourceString.name: ReferenceModePredicateReading
ResourceString.comment: returns The reading for the predicate created by setting the ref mode.

ResourceString.name: ReferenceModePredicateInverseReading
ResourceString.comment: returns The inverse reading for the predicate created by setting the ref mode.

ResourceString.name: ModelReferenceModeEditorFormatStringColumn
ResourceString.comment: returns The Column header text for the Format String column.

ResourceString.name: ModelReferenceModeEditorKindColumn
ResourceString.comment: returns The Column header text for the Kind column.

ResourceString.name: ModelReferenceModeEditorNameColumn
ResourceString.comment: returns The Column header text for the name column.

ResourceString.name: FactEditorToolWindowCaption
ResourceString.comment: The caption of the Fact Editor Tool Window

ResourceString.name: ModelExceptionReferenceModeAmbiguousName
ResourceString.comment: Exception message output when multiple reference modes are found with the same name

ResourceString.name: ModelExceptionSubtypeConstraintAndRolePatternFixed
ResourceString.comment: Exception message when an attempt is made to modify the roles collection or internal constraints of a SubtypeFact.

ResourceString.name: ModelExceptionSubtypeFactNotNested
ResourceString.comment: Exception message when an attempt is made to nest a SubtypeFact.

ResourceString.name: ModelExceptionSubtypeFactCycle
ResourceString.comment: Exception message when an attempt is made to add a subtype relationship where the subtype is a direct or indirect subtype of the supertype.

ResourceString.name: ModelReferenceModePickerFormatString
ResourceString.comment: returns the format string for the display text for reference mode picker

ResourceString.name: ModelErrorReadingTooFewRolesMessage
ResourceString.comment: Text displayed in the text of the TooFewRolesError

ResourceString.name: ModelErrorReadingTooManyRolesMessage
ResourceString.comment: Text displayed in the text of the TooManyRolesError

ResourceString.name: ModelReadingRoleDeletedRoleText
ResourceString.comment: Text used to replace a role place holder when the role is deleted

ResourceString.name: ModelErrorFactTypeRequiresInternalUniquessConstraintMessage
ResourceString.comment: Text displayed in the text of the FactTypeRequiresReadingError

ResourceString.name: ModelErrorFactTypeRequiresReadingMessage
ResourceString.comment: Text displayed in the text of the FactTypeRequiresInternalUniquessContraintError

ResourceString.name: ModelErrorValueTypeDataTypeNotSpecifiedMessage
ResourceString.comment: Text displayed for an unspecified data type.

ResourceString.name: ModelErrorFactTypeRequiresIUCActivateTransactionName
ResourceString.comment: The name given to the transaction used when adding an internal uniqueness constraint to correct the error of lacking one.

ResourceString.name: ValueRangeDefinitionDefinitionContainerPattern
ResourceString.comment: Pattern showing left- and right-string to use for containing a value range definition.

ResourceString.name: ValueRangeDefinitionRangeDelimiter
ResourceString.comment: String used to delimit sets of value ranges in a definition.

ResourceString.name: ValueRangeDefinitionValueDelimiter
ResourceString.comment: String used to delimit the min- and max-values of a value range.

ResourceString.name: ValueRangeDefinitionStringContainerPattern
ResourceString.comment: Pattern showing left- and right-string to use for containing a value range as a string.

ResourceString.name: ValueRangeDefinitionOpenInclusionContainer
ResourceString.comment: Pattern showing left- and right-string to use to indicate the min- and max-values are open (i.e. the value itself is not a member of the range).

ResourceString.name: ValueRangeDefinitionClosedInclusionContainer
ResourceString.comment: Pattern showing left- and right-string to use to indicate the min- and max-values are closed (i.e. the value itself is a member of the range).

ResourceString.name: ObjectTypeShapeIsIndependentReading
ResourceString.comment: The string used to display that an object is independent.

ResourceString.name: ReadingShapeReadingSeparator
ResourceString.comment: The string used to divide multiple readings shown in a ReadingShape.

ResourceString.name: ReadingShapeEllipsis
ResourceString.comment: The character to use as the object placeholder in a ReadingShape (an ellipsis).

ResourceString.name: ReadingShapeInverseReading
ResourceString.comment: The string to use to indicate that a reading goes in the opposite direction. The preferred string (per Terry Halpin) is "\u25C4 ", but the unicode character is not available in that Tahoma font.

ResourceString.name: ReadingShapeAttachedRoleDisplay
ResourceString.comment: The string used to display a reading with a non-primary order when the role is attached.

ResourceString.name: ReadingShapeUnattachedRoleDisplay
ResourceString.comment: The string used to display a reading with a non-primary order when the role is not attached.

ResourceString.name: NMinusOneRuleInternalSpan
ResourceString.comment: Text diplayed in the Model Error when the span of the internal constraint is less than the span of the Fact Type - 1

ResourceString.name: ModelErrorSingleColumnConstraintCompatibleRolePlayerTypeError
ResourceString.comment: The role players in an external constraint must have compatible types. Replacement field {0} is the constraint name and {1} is the model name.

ResourceString.name: ModelErrorMultiColumnConstraintCompatibleRolePlayerTypeError
ResourceString.comment: The role players in an external constraint column must have compatible types. Replacement field {0} is the constraint name, {1} is the model name, and {2} is the (1-based) column number.

ResourceString.name: ModelErrorRolePlayerRequiredError
ResourceString.comment: Text displayed in the text of the RoleRequiresRolePlayerError. {0} is the (1-based) role number, {1} is the name of the fact, and {2} is the name of the model.

ResourceString.name: ModelErrorExternalEqualityIsImpliedByMandatoryError
ResourceString.comment: Constraint '{0}' is implied by mandatory constraints.

ResourceString.name: ModelErrorEntityTypeRequiresReferenceSchemeMessage
ResourceString.comment: An entity type must have a primary reference scheme. Replacement field {0} is the entity type name and {1} is the model name.

ResourceString.name: SimpleMandatoryImpliesDisjunctiveMandatoryError
ResourceString.comment: The mandatory disjunctive constraint is implied by a simple mandatory constraint. Replacement field {0} is the constraint name and {1} is the model name.

ResourceString.name: ModelErrorFrequencyConstraintMinMaxError
ResourceString.comment: Text displayed in the text of the FrequencyConstraintMinMaxError. {0} is the constraint name and {1} is the model name

ResourceString.name: ModelVerbalizationWindowTitle
ResourceString.comment: Text to place in the title of the verbalization tool window.

ResourceString.name: ModelErrorImpliedInternalUniquenessConstraintError
ResourceString.comment: Text displayed in the text of the ImpliedInternalUniquenessConstraintError. {0} is the fact type name

ResourceString.name: ImpliedInternalConstraintFixMessage
ResourceString.comment: The message of the auto-fix message box for implied internal constraints

ResourceString.name: RemoveInternalConstraintsTransaction
ResourceString.comment: The name of the transaction that auto-fixes implied and duplicate internal constraints.

ResourceString.name: AutoLayoutTransactionName
ResourceString.comment: The transaction name used by AutoLayout command. The text appears in the undo dropdown in the VS IDE.
